author: dlr
msg: message from 'diff', which isn't particularly useful.  Note that

author: hwright
msg: For wc->wc copies and moves, only open the wc once.  Use the resulting
adm_access to handle all the moves or copies.
This introduces a test failure in basic_tests-31, which involves moving to a
relative path.  Something to do with getting the common ancestor of a relative
(Note: This commit was reverted in r22573.)
(wc_to_wc_copy_single):  Add an adm_access arg, and use it to retrieve the
correct svn_wc_adm_access_t for the src and dst.
(wc_to_wc_copy):  Find the common parent of the copy, and open adm_access at
that path.  Pass that adm_access to wc_to_wc_single().
